main.description: I have been working as software QA engineer in Agile software development environments. Developed, implemented, and maintained the user acceptance and full regression test cases/scripts/scenarios to ensure user-level and back-end qualities for web and api based applications
main.bio: Experience in Test Automation with Selenium and Rest-Assured in different languages.(Java,Javascript,Ruby,Python). Excellent knowledge of functional, usability, acceptance, exploratory, regression testing with cross-browser approach. Hands-on experience in designing and managing Test Plans, Test Suites, Test Runs and Test Cases, Functional specifications. Motivated to learn the latest technology, methodologies and skills, capable of learning quickly.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Computer engineering is defined as the discipline that embodies the science and technology of design, implementation, and maintenance of software and hardware components of computing systems and development of computer-controlled applications.

certification.description: The goal of Code Quality and Analysis is the support high-quality software development activities and ensure technically mature projects.
This education for gaining recent test techniques in the Agile Projects.
This course includes TDD which is one of the most crucial approaches of the Agile concept.

work.title: QA Automation Team Lead
work.description: Managing the global QA automation team while creating a strong automation infrastructure is my key responsibility. Developing and supporting QA Automation solutions with Java, Selenium, Appium, Rest-assured, AWS tools for our clients and managing all the automation lifecycle from integration to E2E phases on CI/CD pipelines for different platforms such as Web, Mobile, API.

work.title: Senior QA Automation Engineer
work.description: Segmentify is creating personalized shopping experience with AI based recommendation engine. I am responsible with all QA and CI processes of development environments.

work.title: Test and Release Manager
work.description: TeamSQL is a SQL Client which support SQL and No-SQL 6 different types of databases on three Operating systems. My duties are Test And Release processes of TeamSQL. I was managing our Test Team which responsible for functional tests, meanwhile I was scheduling and preparing the test plans, test reports, preparing automation scenarios and developing automation scripts.

work.title: Test Analyst
work.description: As a Test Analyst, I was part of an Agile Team and my responsibilities were planing test strategies and test cycle, preparing test documents, preparing automation scenarios and developing automation scenarios.

work.title: Test Engineer
work.description: During my tenure, I was responsible for the testing of the CRM application whom used by Vodafone's franchisees and call centers, which managing 28 million subscribers.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: As a freelance developer, I developed small projects(Mobile/Web) for my individual customers.

work.title: Intern DBA

work.title: Intern Mobile Software Developer
work.description: During my tenure, I developed a Mobile CRM application which helps doctors for their appointments.
